entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
